P110509.description: Taxes on goods and services include general sales and turnover or value added taxes, selective excises on goods, selective taxes on services, taxes on the use of goods or property, taxes on extraction and production of minerals, and profits of fiscal monopolies.

P110510.label: Customs and other import duties (current LCU)
P110510.description: Customs and other import duties are all levies collected on goods that are entering the country or services delivered by nonresidents to residents. They include levies imposed for revenue or protection purposes and determined on a specific or ad valorem basis as long as they are restricted to imported goods or services.

P110511.label: Customs and other import duties (% of tax revenue)
P110511.description: Customs and other import duties are all levies collected on goods that are entering the country or services delivered by nonresidents to residents. They include levies imposed for revenue or protection purposes and determined on a specific or ad valorem basis as long as they are restricted to imported goods or services.

P110512.label: Taxes on international trade (current LCU)
P110512.description: Taxes on international trade include import duties, export duties, profits of export or import monopolies, exchange profits, and exchange taxes.

P110513.label: Taxes on international trade (% of revenue)
P110513.description: Taxes on international trade include import duties, export duties, profits of export or import monopolies, exchange profits, and exchange taxes.

P110514.label: Other taxes (current LCU)
P110514.description: Other taxes include employer payroll or labor taxes, taxes on property, and taxes not allocable to other categories, such as penalties for late payment or nonpayment of taxes.

P110515.label: Other taxes (% of revenue)
P110515.description: Other taxes include employer payroll or labor taxes, taxes on property, and taxes not allocable to other categories, such as penalties for late payment or nonpayment of taxes.

P110516.label: Tax revenue (current LCU)
P110516.description: Tax revenue refers to compulsory transfers to the central government for public purposes. Certain compulsory transfers such as fines, penalties, and most social security contributions are excluded. Refunds and corrections of erroneously collected tax revenue are treated as negative revenue.

P110517.label: Tax revenue (% of GDP)
P110517.description: Tax revenue refers to compulsory transfers to the central government for public purposes. Certain compulsory transfers such as fines, penalties, and most social security contributions are excluded. Refunds and corrections of erroneously collected tax revenue are treated as negative revenue.

P110518.label: Taxes on income, profits and capital gains (current LCU)
P110518.description: Taxes on income, profits, and capital gains are levied on the actual or presumptive net income of individuals, on the profits of corporations and enterprises, and on capital gains, whether realized or not, on land, securities, and other assets. Intragovernmental payments are eliminated in consolidation.

P110519.label: Taxes on income, profits and capital gains (% of revenue)
P110519.description: Taxes on income, profits, and capital gains are levied on the actual or presumptive net income of individuals, on the profits of corporations and enterprises, and on capital gains, whether realized or not, on land, securities, and other assets. Intragovernmental payments are eliminated in consolidation.

P110520.label: Taxes on income, profits and capital gains (% of total taxes)
P110520.description: Taxes on income, profits, and capital gains are levied on the actual or presumptive net income of individuals, on the profits of corporations and enterprises, and on capital gains, whether realized or not, on land, securities, and other assets. Intragovernmental payments are eliminated in consolidation.

P110521.label: Compensation of employees (current LCU)
P110521.description: Compensation of employees consists of all payments in cash, as well as in kind (such as food and housing), to employees in return for services rendered, and government contributions to social insurance schemes such as social security and pensions that provide benefits to employees.

P110522.label: Compensation of employees (% of expense)
P110522.description: Compensation of employees consists of all payments in cash, as well as in kind (such as food and housing), to employees in return for services rendered, and government contributions to social insurance schemes such as social security and pensions that provide benefits to employees.

P110523.label: Goods and services expense (current LCU)
P110523.description: Goods and services include all government payments in exchange for goods and services used for the production of market and nonmarket goods and services. Own-account capital formation is excluded.

P110524.label: Goods and services expense (% of expense)
P110524.description: Goods and services include all government payments in exchange for goods and services used for the production of market and nonmarket goods and services. Own-account capital formation is excluded.

P110525.label: Interest payments (current LCU)
P110525.description: Interest payments include interest payments on government debt--including long-term bonds, long-term loans, and other debt instruments--to domestic and foreign residents.

P110526.label: Interest payments (% of revenue)
P110526.description: Interest payments include interest payments on government debt--including long-term bonds, long-term loans, and other debt instruments--to domestic and foreign residents.

P110527.label: Interest payments (% of expense)
P110527.description: Interest payments include interest payments on government debt--including long-term bonds, long-term loans, and other debt instruments--to domestic and foreign residents.

P110528.label: Other expense (current LCU)
P110528.description: Other expense is spending on dividends, rent, and other miscellaneous expenses, including provision for consumption of fixed capital.

P110529.label: Other expense (% of expense)
P110529.description: Other expense is spending on dividends, rent, and other miscellaneous expenses, including provision for consumption of fixed capital.

P110530.label: Expense (current LCU)
P110530.description: Expense is cash payments for operating activities of the government in providing goods and services. It includes compensation of employees (such as wages and salaries), interest and subsidies, grants, social benefits, and other expenses such as rent and dividends.

P110531.label: Expense (% of GDP)
P110531.description: Expense is cash payments for operating activities of the government in providing goods and services. It includes compensation of employees (such as wages and salaries), interest and subsidies, grants, social benefits, and other expenses such as rent and dividends.

P110532.label: Subsidies and other transfers (current LCU)
P110532.description: Subsidies, grants, and other social benefits include all unrequited, nonrepayable transfers on current account to private and public enterprises; grants to foreign governments, international organizations, and other government units; and social security, social assistance benefits, and employer social benefits in cash and in kind.

P110533.label: Subsidies and other transfers (% of expense)
P110533.description: Subsidies, grants, and other social benefits include all unrequited, nonrepayable transfers on current account to private and public enterprises; grants to foreign governments, international organizations, and other government units; and social security, social assistance benefits, and employer social benefits in cash and in kind.

P110534.label: Distance to frontier score (0=lowest performance to 100=frontier)
P110534.description: Distance to frontier score illustrates the distance of an economy to the "frontier," which represents the best performance observed on each Doing Business topic across all economies and years included since 2005. An economy's distance to frontier is indicated on a scale from 0 to 100, where 0 represents the lowest performance and 100 the frontier. For example, a score of 75 in 2012 means an economy was 25 percentage points away from the frontier constructed from the best performances across all economies and across time. A score of 80 in 2013 would indicate the economy is improving.

P110535.label: Business extent of disclosure index (0=less disclosure to 10=more disclosure)
P110535.description: Disclosure index measures the extent to which investors are protected through disclosure of ownership and financial information. The index ranges from 0 to 10, with higher values indicating more disclosure.

P110536.label: Ease of doing business index (1=most business-friendly regulations)
P110536.description: Ease of doing business ranks economies from 1 to 190, with first place being the best. A high ranking (a low numerical rank) means that the regulatory environment is conducive to business operation. The index averages the country's percentile rankings on 10 topics covered in the World Bank's Doing Business. The ranking on each topic is the simple average of the percentile rankings on its component indicators.

P110537.label: New business density (new registrations per 1,000 people ages 15-64)
P110537.description: New businesses registered are the number of new limited liability corporations registered in the calendar year.

P110538.label: New businesses registered (number)
P110538.description: New businesses registered are the number of new limited liability corporations registered in the calendar year.

P110539.label: Depth of credit information index (0=low to 8=high)
P110539.description: Depth of credit information index measures rules affecting the scope, accessibility, and quality of credit information available through public or private credit registries. The index ranges from 0 to 8, with higher values indicating the availability of more credit information, from either a public registry or a private bureau, to facilitate lending decisions.

P110540.label: Private credit bureau coverage (% of adults)
P110540.description: Private credit bureau coverage reports the number of individuals or firms listed by a private credit bureau with current information on repayment history, unpaid debts, or credit outstanding. The number is expressed as a percentage of the adult population.

P2050.label: wingspan
P2050.description: distance from one wingtip to the other, of an airplane or a bird

P2051.label: M sin i
P2051.description: exoplanet mass multiplied by the inclination angle

P2052.label: speed
P2052.description: magnitude of the velocity of the item

P2053.label: watershed area
P2053.description: size of a stream's watershed (drainage basin)

P2054.label: density
P2054.description: density of a substance with phase of matter and temperature as qualifiers

P2055.label: electrical conductivity
P2055.description: electrical conductivity of a substance with phase of matter and temperature as qualifiers

P2056.label: heat capacity
P2056.description: specific heat capacity of a substance, with phase of matter and temperature as qualifiers

P2060.label: luminosity
P2060.description: total amount of energy emitted by an astronomical object per unit time

P2066.label: fusion enthalpy
P2066.description: fusion enthalpy of a substance at the melting temperature

P2067.label: mass
P2067.description: mass (in colloquial usage also known as weight) of the item

P2068.label: thermal conductivity
P2068.description: property of a material that describes how efficiently heat is conducted

P2069.label: magnetic moment
P2069.description: torque a particle will experience in an external magnetic field

P2073.label: vehicle range
P2073.description: distance a vehicle can travel without refuelling

P2075.label: speed of sound
P2075.description: speed of sound waves in a material. Use qualifiers to specify the measurement conditions.

P2076.label: temperature
P2076.description: qualifier to indicate at what temperature something took place

P2077.label: pressure
P2077.description: qualifier to indicate at what pressure something took place

P2097.label: term length of office
P2097.description: length of time in years (unit: Q577) a person (usually a politician) is to serve in a particular office. Do not add bounds.

P2101.label: melting point
P2101.description: melting point is the temperature at which a solid changes its state from solid to liquid at atmospheric pressure

P2102.label: boiling point
P2102.description: temperature at which a substance changes its phase from liquid to gas (indicate the corresponding pressure as qualifier)

P2103.label: size of team at start
P2103.description: number of players/sled dogs/etc. in a team at the start of a match or race

P2105.label: size of team at finish
P2105.description: number of players/sled dogs/etc. in a team at the end of the race or match
aliases: size of team at the end

P2109.label: installed capacity
P2109.description: power produced by the engine or plant (use with unit of power)

P2112.label: wing area
P2112.description: area of an aircraft's wing surfaces

P2113.label: sublimation temperature
P2113.description: temperature at which a substance changes directly from solid to gaseous (indicate corresponding pressure qualifier)

P2114.label: half-life
P2114.description: time required for the amount of something to fall to half its initial value

P2116.label: enthalpy of vaporization
P2116.description: vaporization enthalpy of a substance with temperature as qualifier

P2117.label: combustion enthalpy
P2117.description: enthalpy difference of a substance for combustion

P2118.label: kinematic viscosity
P2118.description: viscosity of a substance, with phase of matter (P515) and temperature (P2076) as qualifiers

P2119.label: vapor pressure
P2119.description: pressure exerted by a vapor in thermodynamic equilibrium with its condensed phases

P2120.label: radius
P2120.description: distance between the center and the surface of a circle or sphere

P2124.label: member count
P2124.description: number of people who are part of an organization at a particular time

P2128.label: flash point
P2128.description: lowest temperature at which it can vaporize to form an ignitable mixture in air. Add qualifier for measurement method (P459): open cup or closed cup. Not equal to fire point.

P2129.label: IDLH
P2129.description: Immediately Dangerous to Life and Health value

P2130.label: cost
P2130.description: amount of money spent on building or producing an object

P2131.label: nominal GDP
P2131.description: market value of all officially recognized final goods and services produced within a country in a given period of time

P2132.label: nominal GDP per capita
P2132.description: country's total GDP divided by the population

P2133.label: total debt
P2133.description: amount of debt for a company, organization or public entity

P2134.label: total reserves
P2134.description: total reserves comprise holdings of monetary gold, special drawing rights, reserves of IMF members held by the IMF, and holdings of foreign exchange under the control of monetary authorities

P2135.label: total exports
P2135.description: amount of goods and services sold to other countries

P2136.label: total imports
P2136.description: amount of goods and services bought from other countries

P2137.label: total equity
P2137.description: amount of equity value for an entity

P2138.label: total liabilities
P2138.description: total liabilities for a corporation or entity

P2139.label: total revenue
P2139.description: income gained by an organization during a given time frame. not to be confused with fiscal revenue

P2140.label: foreign direct investment net outflow
P2140.description: net outflow of equity capital, reinvestment of earnings, other long-term capital, and short-term capital

P2141.label: foreign direct investment net inflow
P2141.description: net inflow of equity capital, reinvestment of earnings, other long-term capital, and short-term capital

P2142.label: box office
P2142.description: box office takings accumulated by a film

P2143.label: genome size
P2143.description: size of the genome in base pairs

P2144.label: frequency
P2144.description: frequency in Hz at which the subject works, for example the frequency a radio station can be received

P2145.label: explosive energy equivalent
P2145.description: amount of energy discharged during an explosion

P2146.label: orbital period
P2146.description: the time taken for a given astronomic object to make one complete orbit about another object

P2147.label: rotation period
P2147.description: the time that astronomic objects takes to complete one revolution around its axis of rotation

P2148.label: distance from river mouth
P2148.description: qualifier for P974 statements on streams

P2154.label: binding energy
P2154.description: energy required to disassemble a whole system into separate parts

P2160.label: mass excess
P2160.description: difference between its actual mass and its mass number in atomic mass units

P2177.label: solubility
P2177.description: property of a chemical to dissolve in another chemical forming a solution. Provide solvent (P2178) and temperature (P2076) as qualifiers

P2196.label: students count
P2196.description: number of students of any type in an educational organization

P2197.label: production rate
P2197.description: amount of produced in a given time

P2198.label: average gradient
P2198.description: gradient expressed as a percentage (between 0 and 1)

P2199.label: autoignition temperature
P2199.description: lowest temperature at which it will spontaneously ignite in a normal atmosphere without an external source of ignition

P2200.label: electric charge
P2200.description: electric charge of a subatomic particle

P2202.label: lower flammable limit
P2202.description: the lower bound of the concentration range over which a flammable mixture of gas or vapour in air can be ignited at a given temperature and pressure (0-1)

P2203.label: upper flammable limit
P2203.description: upper bound of the concentration range over which a flammable mixture of gas or vapour in air can be ignited at a given temperature and pressure (0-1)

P2204.label: minimum explosive concentration
P2204.description: minimum concentration at which a chemical can explode

P2211.label: position angle
P2211.description: measurement relating to observed visual binary stars (use with P2210)

P2212.label: angular distance
P2212.description: size of the angle between the two directions originating from the observer and pointing towards these two objects (use with P2210)

P2213.label: longitude of ascending node
P2213.description: property of one of the orbital elements used to specify the orbit of an object in space

P2216.label: radial velocity
P2216.description: component of the object's velocity that points in the direction of the radius connecting the object and the point

P2218.label: net worth
P2218.description: estimated totality of wealth possessed by a person

P2219.label: real gross domestic product growth rate
P2219.description: percentage change in nominal GDP from one year to the next minus the inflation rate

P2221.label: flux
P2221.description: the observed flux in a particular wavelength band of an astronomical object

P2222.label: gyromagnetic ratio
P2222.description: characteristic property of any elementary particle

P2223.label: decay width
P2223.description: characteristic property of any elementary particle

P2225.label: discharge
P2225.description: volume rate of water flow which is transported through a given cross-sectional area

P2226.label: market capitalization
P2226.description: total value of issued shares by a publicly traded company

P2227.label: metallicity
P2227.description: abundance of elements that are heavier than hydrogen or helium in an astronomical object

P2228.label: maximum thrust
P2228.description: maximum thrust specified for a jet engine

P2230.label: torque
P2230.description: torque of a machine, a motor/engine/powerplant, or a vehicle

P2232.label: cash
P2232.description: the value of cash and securities held by a state government

P2233.label: semi-major axis of an orbit
P2233.description: semi-major axis of a stable orbit (Astronomy)

P2240.label: median lethal dose
P2240.description: the dose required to kill half the members of a tested population after a specified test duration (LC₅₀ → P2712)

P2243.label: apoapsis
P2243.description: distance, at which a celestial body is the farthest to the object it orbits

P2244.label: periapsis
P2244.description: distance, at which a celestial body is the closest to the object it orbits

P2248.label: argument of periapsis
P2248.description: angle from the body's ascending node to its periapsis

P2250.label: life expectancy
P2250.description: life expectancy for this group or species

P1082.label: population
P1082.description: number of people inhabiting the place; number of people of subject

P1083.label: maximum capacity
P1083.description: number of people allowed for a venue or vehicle

P1086.label: atomic number
P1086.description: number of protons found in the nucleus of the atom

P1087.label: Elo rating
P1087.description: quantitative measure of one's game-playing ability, particularly in classical chess

P1088.label: Mohs' hardness
P1088.description: qualitative ordinal scale characterizing scratch resistance of various minerals

P1090.label: redshift
P1090.description: the redshift measure of an astronomical object

P1093.label: gross tonnage
P1093.description: unitless index related to a ship's overall internal volume

P1096.label: orbital eccentricity
P1096.description: amount of the deviation of an orbit from a perfect circle

P1097.label: g-factor
P1097.description: characteristic property of any elementary particle (Landé factor)

P1098.label: number of speakers
P1098.description: number of people who speak a language

P1099.label: number of masts
P1099.description: number of masts a ship has

P1100.label: number of cylinders
P1100.description: number of cylinders in a piston engine or compressor

P1101.label: floors above ground
P1101.description: above ground floor count of a building (ground floor and attic included)

P1102.label: flattening
P1102.description: measure of the compression of an ellipsoid of revolution

P1103.label: number of platform tracks
P1103.description: number of tracks served by the platforms at a railway station

P1104.label: number of pages
P1104.description: number of pages in an edition of a written work

P1106.label: Sandbox-Quantity
P1106.description: property to be used for testing the quantity datatype

P1107.label: proportion
P1107.description: to be used as a qualifier, value must be between 0 and 1

P1108.label: electronegativity
P1108.description: tendency of an atom or functional group to attract electrons

P1109.label: refractive index
P1109.description: refractive index of a substance with wavelength and temperature as qualifiers

P1110.label: attendance
P1110.description: number of people (spectators, ticket holders) at an event or exhibition

P1111.label: votes received
P1111.description: qualifier stating the number of votes for a candidate in an election

P1113.label: number of episodes
P1113.description: number of episodes in a film/TV/radio series

P1114.label: quantity
P1114.description: number of instances of this subject

P1120.label: number of deaths
P1120.description: total number of people who died as a direct result of an event or cause

P1121.label: oxidation state
P1121.description: this atom has or can have the oxidation number

P1122.label: spin quantum number
P1122.description: a quantum number; a dimensionless rational number;  the intrinsic spin angular momentum is this times the Dirac or reduced Planck constant

P1125.label: Gini coefficient
P1125.description: measure of statistical dispersion intended to represent the income distribution of a nation's residents

P1126.label: isospin quantum number
P1126.description: characteristic property of any elementary particle

P1127.label: isospin z-component
P1127.description: characteristic property of any elementary particle

P1128.label: employees
P1128.description: total number of employees of a company at a given point in time

P1129.label: national team caps
P1129.description: total number of games officially played by a sportsman for national team

P1132.label: number of participants
P1132.description: number of participants of an event, e.g. people or groups of people that take part in the event (NO units)

P1139.label: floors below ground
P1139.description: total number of below ground floors of the building

P1141.label: number of processor cores
P1141.description: number of independent actual processing units (*not* threads)

P1148.label: neutron number
P1148.description: number of neutrons of an isotope

P1164.label: cardinality of the group
P1164.description: number of elements in a finite group

P1174.label: visitors per year
P1174.description: number of people visiting a location or an event each year

P1181.label: numeric value
P1181.description: numerical value of a number, a mathematical constant, or a physical constant

P1193.label: prevalence
P1193.description: portion of a population with a given disease

P1198.label: unemployment rate
P1198.description: portion of a workforce population that is not employed

P1215.label: apparent magnitude
P1215.description: apparent magnitude of an astronomic object

P1279.label: inflation rate
P1279.description: percent change in the consumer price index (CPI)
aliases: inflation rate of consumer price index

P1295.label: emissivity
P1295.description: ability of a substance to radiate thermal energy from its surface

P1301.label: number of elevators
P1301.description: number of elevators in a building

P1314.label: number of spans
P1314.description: number of spans a bridge has
aliases: number of arches of a bridge

P1339.label: number of injured
P1339.description: number of people with non-fatal injuries in an event

P1342.label: number of seats
P1342.description: number of seats/members in an assembly (legislative house or similar)

P1345.label: number of victims of killer
P1345.description: number of victims of a serial killer or murder
aliases: number of victims made by killer

P1350.label: number of matches played/races/starts
P1350.description: matches or games a player or a team played during an event. Also a total number of matches a player officially appeared in during the whole career.

P1351.label: number of points/goals/set scored
P1351.description: goals / points scored in a match or an event used as qualifier to the participant. Use P1358 for league points.

P1352.label: ranking
P1352.description: the subject's numbered position within a competition or group of performers

P1355.label: number of wins
P1355.description: number of sporting matches, games or events won

P1356.label: number of losses
P1356.description: number of sporting matches, games or events lost

P1357.label: matches/games drawn/tied
P1357.description: number of matches or games drawn or tied in a league or an event

P1358.label: points for
